article_title: Lucy Lou would do a better job as president
article_text:
Buy Photo DOG PRESIDENT AUGUST 24; 2015 hedshot of Lucy Lou, canine mayor of Rabbit Hash. who is running for U.S. President in 2016. (Photo: The Enquirer/Patrick Reddy)Buy Photo

We should send the Mayor of Rabbit Hash, Lucy, to The White House (“Dog for president?” Aug. 29). I bet she could do a better job and not spend so much money. Her vet bills would be cheaper then Obamacare.

Your say: Submit a letter to the editor

Bill McCauslin, Delhi Township

Read or Share this story: http://cin.ci/1EAtAnc
